meanings.definition: A type of dance in duple time.
meanings.sent1: During the ball, they performed elegant allemandes.
meanings.sent2: The dance instructor taught the students how to do allemandes.
meanings.sent3: The allemandes at the party were so graceful that everyone was mesmerized.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were as precise as allemandes in a musical composition.
meanings.sent5: The allemandes they danced were like a synchronized ballet of steps and turns.

meanings.definition: A type of figure in square dancing.
meanings.sent1: The caller directed the dancers to form allemandes in the square.
meanings.sent2: In square dancing, allemandes are a common part of the routine.
meanings.sent3: The allemandes in the square dance confused the new participants but added to the fun.
meanings.sent4: The allemandes in the square were like pieces of a puzzle coming together.
meanings.sent5: The allemandes in the square dance created a beautiful pattern on the dance floor.

meanings.sent1: She baked delicious allemandes for the bake sale.
meanings.sent2: The bakery's specialty was their almond-flavored allemandes.
meanings.sent3: The allemandes she made were so good that they disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked allemandes filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The allemandes melted in her mouth, leaving a sweet almond taste behind.
